properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 3:50AM EST until February 10 at 5:24AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers
in North Carolina...South Carolina...


French Broad River Near Fletcher affecting Buncombe and Henderson
Counties.
South Fork Catawba River At Lowell affecting Gaston County.
Saluda River At West Pelzer affecting Anderson and Greenville
Counties.
Saluda River Near Greenville affecting Greenville and Pickens
Counties.

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers
in North Carolina...

French Broad River At Blantyre affecting Henderson and Transylvania
Counties.


.Runoff from previous heavy rain will result in the river remaining
above flood stage.

The Flood Warning continues for
The French Broad River At Blantyre.
* until late Sunday night.
* At  3:30 AM Saturday the stage was 18.9 feet.
* Minor Flood Stage is 16.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* FORECAST: The river will continue rising to near 19.3 feet by this
morning. The river will fall below Minor Flood Stage Sunday
afternoon.
* Impact...At 19.0 feet...Moderate Flood Stage.  The French Broad
River may be overtopping the railroad tracks and floodwaters may be
threatening a trailer park on River Ridge Rd. Floodwaters may be
approaching buildings north of Grove Bridge Road along US 64. Parts
of River Road, Pleasant Grove Rd., Butler Bridge Rd. and Big Willow
Rd. are likely flooding. Associated tributaries, including Little
River, are likely flooding due to high water levels on the French
Broad River.
properties.instruction:
The latest stages and forecasts for rivers can be found on our web
page at http://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=gsp

Please report high water...flooding and landslides to the National
Weather Service Greenville-Spartanburg by calling toll free...1...8 0
0...2 6 7...8 1 0 1...or by posting on our Facebook page...or tweet
it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and
the specific location where it occurred.
